title: 22 Coaching Cat Memes Mentally Preparing You That Sunday is Ending and Monday is Coming
description: We know it's the weekend, but every weekend has a weekendend. The beginning of a workweek is actually the end of the weekend, and the weekend is not the end of a week. That's a lie. We live in the weekend and then it ends with the workweek coming. But who can we prepare for this? Mentally, it's tough. But if you're a cat pawrent you have a solution in your home - you have a cat. A cat can help you mentally prepare for a Monday that's about to come. They soothe you with their purring magic and distract you with fun playtime.And if you don't have a cat to help you in this way? Well, that's why we prepared these coaching cat memes, they're trained to help you prepare mentally with memes! Sunday will leave us, Monday will arrive, but you're stronger because you have these much-needed cat memes to help you through this preparation process. You are meowntally strong. You can do it. You can face Monday. But first, look at these funny cat memes.
author: Ayala Sorotsky
excerpt: 22 Coaching Cat Memes Mentally Preparing You That Sunday is Ending and Monday is Coming - World's largest collection of cat memes and other animals

html:
We know it's the weekend, but every weekend has a weekendend. The beginning of a workweek is actually the end of the weekend, and the weekend is not the end of a week. That's a lie. We live in the weekend and then it ends with the workweek coming. But who can we prepare for this? Mentally, it's tough. But if you're a cat pawrent you have a solution in your home - you have a cat. A cat can help you mentally prepare for a Monday that's about to come. They soothe you with their purring magic and distract you with fun playtime.

And if you don't have a cat to help you in this way? Well, that's why we prepared these coaching cat memes, they're trained to help you prepare mentally with memes! Sunday will leave us, Monday will arrive, but you're stronger because you have these much-needed cat memes to help you through this preparation process. You are meowntally strong. You can do it. You can face Monday. But first, look at these funny cat memes.
